Bell pepper
Type: Material
Value: 4
Fine Value: 24
Keywords: Ingredient
Plant
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A colourful, crunchy vegetable, perfect for salads or stir-fries.

The Bell pepper item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Bell pepper is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Make a roasted bell pepper Needs Basic Kitchen service or better. Cooking lvl. 44 1x Bell pepper
5x Pepper		 1x Roasted bell pepper

Job Boards

Bell pepper can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Rewards
Halfling Campgrounds job board Halfling Campgrounds 1 +2  Halfling Rebels Faction Reputation
1x   Chest of the Halfling Rebels

Sources

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Summer cave foraging Foraging lvl. 50 1-3 57.802%† ~1 in 2 267 steps 133 steps
Swamp foraging Foraging lvl. 45 1 14.265% ~1 in 7 1,402 steps 701 steps

†Note: This activity rolls for loot more than once.
‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
